org.elasticsearch.action.indexedscripts.delete

Class DeleteIndexedScriptRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.ContextHolder
      • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportMessage<TransportRequest>
        • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportRequest
          • org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest<DeleteIndexedScriptRequest>
            • org.elasticsearch.action.indexedscripts.delete.DeleteIndexedScriptRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndicesRequest, Streamable

    public class DeleteIndexedScriptRequest
extends ActionRequest<DeleteIndexedScriptRequest>
implements IndicesRequest
    A request to delete a script from the script index based on its scriptLang and id. Best created using

    The operation requires the , scriptLang(String) and id(String) to be set.

    See Also:
    DeleteIndexedScriptResponse, Client.deleteIndexedScript(DeleteIndexedScriptRequest)
